description: Using the milestone-proposed PPA, attempts to install nova-network via apt will fail due to the inability to satisfy a dependancy for nova-network.  This package does not exist in in Ubuntu 11.04.  Manually installing the packages from Oneiric resolves the issue but is not a proper solution.
title: dnsmasq-utils required by nova-network but unavailable on natty

comments.content: Using the milestone-proposed PPA, attempts to install nova-network via apt will fail due to the inability to satisfy a dependancy for nova-network.
